name: Everland Package Tour
description:
Everland is the theme park, full of thrilling attraction.
You will enjoy the day of entertainments with abundant variety of attractions, and fun time for family. The park was opened as Natural farm, and changed in through constant efforts since 1976. It fascinated everyone with the brand new items like the first rose festival, animal safari, opening at night. It was changed the name into Everland to celebrate 20th year of opening in 1996. And the park presented a new brand name "Everland resort" as the themed resort in the nature that is for three generation to enjoy together. 
Everland is not only the theme park and the place which have beautiful garden full of varied colorful flowers in each season.
